item.title: Winx Club: The Magic is Back launches April 30
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Action adventure game dated.

Action adventure game Winx Club: The Magic is Back will launch for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on April 30, publisher Maximum Entertainment and developer Iron Frog announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Maximum Entertainment:

About

Coinciding with the brand-new Winx Club: The Magic is Back animated series, this enchanting new adventure brings the Winx fairies to life like never before, combining magical combat, puzzle-solving, and cooperative gameplay.

Players will journey through a range of unforgettable locations inspired by the Winx universe, including the corridors of Alfea College, the mystical Enchanted Forest, the towering Coastal Cliffs, and the ancient Desert Ruins of Red Fountain. At any moment, players can switch between all six fairies, each wielding unique magical powers that open up inventive approaches to combat and puzzle-solving.

Team up with a friend in two-player local cooperative to face enemies side by side. Blending exploration, fast-paced action, and cooperative play, Winx Club: The Magic is Back on consoles faithfully delivers the magic, friendship, and adventure that have made Winx Club a worldwide sensation.

Key Features

  • Play as Your Favorite Fairies – Play as all six members of the Winx Club, tailoring your experience based on your preferred character and their abilities. Freely switch between all five of the Winx while playing.
  • Explore Iconic Settings from the Winx Universe – Attend Alfea College and journey to familiar and distinct Winx locations, including The Enchanted Forest, The Coastal Cliffs, and The Desert Ruins of Red Fountain.
  • Winx Action in Your Hands – Engage in combat against fantasy creatures, where you’ll use each character’s unique magical abilities to bring peace to the lands. Upgrade spells to strengthen your fairies for even more fun.
  • Play with a Friend – With two-player local cooperative play, you and a friend can enjoy Winx Club together!

item.title: Besiege expansion ‘The Broken Bond’ announced
item.content:encoded:
Spiderling Studios has announced Besiege expansion “The Broken Beyond.” It will launch for PC via Steam in Q2 2026.

Here is an overview of the expansion, via its Steam page:

About

Blast-off into “The Broken Beyond” expansion, taking your malevolent machines into space to conquer alien worlds! Put your engineering talents to the test as you master space flight, navigating gravitational fields, avoiding asteroids and other challenges using a suite of exciting new blocks.

Conquer your way through a new campaign, where you’ll travel between planets, unleashing destruction upon new alien foes.

Battle their spacecraft, annihilate their armies and destroy their worlds..

Key Features

  • A campaign of space themed levels.
  • A suite of new space themed blocks.
  • A new sandbox environment.
  • New physics mechanics.

Besiege is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam, GOG, Humble Store, and Microsoft Store.

Watch the teaser trailer below.

item.title: Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl coming to PS5, PC on February 26 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Currently available for Switch.

Experience will release dungeon RPG Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on February 26 in Japan for 4,800 yen, the developer announced.

Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl first launched for Switch on September 18, 2025 in Japan.

The PlayStation 5 and PC versions have been adjusted to make the game more enjoyable based on feedback from the Switch release. An update containing these improvements will be available for the Switch version at a later date.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A nostalgic top-down command RPG meets a loot-heavy hack-and-slash system.

A fresh RPG experience that combines two beloved genres in a way you’ve never seen before.

Key Features

  • A Classic Hero’s Journey Packed With Timeless RPG Adventure!
    • Set off on a grand quest to defeat the Demon Lord, just like the RPGs of old.
    • Trek across wide fields, sail the seas, and battle monsters in lands unknown.
    • Explore dungeons, solve clever gimmicks, and uncover rare treasures.
    • Enjoy the intuitive gameplay and charm unique to top-down RPGs.
  • Create Your Own Legendary Party With Unique Companions!
    • Adventure with a four-member party: the hero and three allies of your choosing.
    • Customize your team by selecting from eight distinct and colorful job classes.
    • As you level up, allocate stat and skill points freely to suit your strategy.
    • Train and strengthen your personalized hero party, and enjoy every battle to the fullest!
  • Irresistible Combat With the MONKARU Skill System!
    • Use powerful skills like “Double Drop” to double your post-battle loot!
    • The thrill of unpredictable rewards turns every fight into a gamble.
    • That addicting, can’t-stop feeling will pull you deep into the hack-and-slash world.
  • Stunning Illustrations Bring Your Adventure to Life
    • Character designs by the renowned Yuji Himukai.
    • Meet charming characters and beautifully illustrated allies who join your journey.
    • Their presence adds color and excitement to your quest, making every moment more memorable.
